column1: Health and social care > NHS hospital waiting times > Cancer waiting times > Monthly > Patients newly diagnosed via the urgent suspected cancer route starting treatment by local health board and month

column2: The performance against the 31 day target for Wales in May 2014 was 97.99 when shown to 2 decimal places
There have been minor revisions to the April 2014 Aneurin Bevan University LHB data. (July 2014)
There have been minor revisions to the April 2013 Cardiff and Vale LHB data. (July 2013)

The patients shown here are those newly diagnosed with cancer who started definitive treatment via the Urgent Suspected Cancer route.

For further information, please see the latest quarterly Statistical Release and the Quality Report.

Care should be taken when interpreting percentages, especially when dealing with small numbers.
